it.polimi.se2019.model.player

Class Inventory

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2019.model.player.Inventory

  • public class Inventory
extends java.lang.Object
    Inventory contains the inventory of each player. Every Ammo, WeaponController or power-up he has, is in this class. In addition, methods for easily add elements to the inventory are exposed, using the same interface Grabbable
